Description:
Detects the execution of the "jsc.exe" (JScript Compiler).
Attacker might abuse this in order to compile JScript files on the fly and bypassing application whitelisting.


Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: JScript Compiler Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%\jsc.exe' and original_file_name = 'jsc.exe'
